toothache.description: A dentist specializes in oral health, including teeth and gums. They can diagnose and treat dental issues like cavities, gum disease, and tooth pain.

blurry_vision.description: An optometrist specializes in eye health and vision. They can perform eye exams, prescribe glasses, and detect eye conditions.

heart_pain.description: A cardiologist specializes in heart and cardiovascular system health. They diagnose and treat heart conditions.

skin_rash.description: A dermatologist specializes in skin, hair, and nail conditions. They treat issues like rashes, acne, and skin allergies.

headache.description: A neurologist specializes in the nervous system, including the brain. They can help diagnose and treat chronic headaches and migraines.

joint_pain.description: A rheumatologist specializes in joint, muscle, and bone disorders. They treat conditions like arthritis and joint pain.

ear_pain.description: An ENT (Ear, Nose, Throat) specialist treats conditions related to the ears, nose, and throat, including ear infections and hearing problems.

back_pain.description: An orthopedist specializes in bones, joints, ligaments, and muscles. They treat back pain and spinal conditions.

cough.description: A pulmonologist specializes in respiratory system and lung health. They treat conditions like asthma, bronchitis, and breathing problems.

stomach_pain.description: A gastroenterologist specializes in the digestive system, including the stomach and intestines. They treat digestive issues and stomach problems.
